clinical_study.brief_title: The Medical Management in Patients Exposed to Chemical Weapons.
clinical_study.official_title: Patient Management in the Contaminated Zone After Exposure to a Chemical Attack: an Multi-Centric Observational Study.

brief_summary.textblock: Observation study measuring medical response in contaminated environment.

detailed_description.textblock: This is an ongoing multicentric observational study that aims to assess the medical response to chemical events during the last five (5) decades (i.e.: 1970-2020), and in any future chemical attack that might occur within the next 15 years (i.e.: 2021-2036). Of note, the data collection will be performed retrospectively and after sites review ethic board (REB) approval.

primary_outcome.time_frame: At the patient's admission at the hospital emergency room (i.e.: end-point of the medical extraction/evacuation).
primary_outcome.description: The percentage of patients to whom the World Health Organization's healthcare guidelines were applied without any delay (i.e.: during a medical extraction/evacuation)

secondary_outcome.measure: Contamination is under-control due to efficient protective measures applied during a medical extraction/evacuation
secondary_outcome.time_frame: At the patient's admission at the hospital emergency room (i.e.: end-point of the medical extraction/evacuation).
secondary_outcome.description: The percentage of patients whose health condition remained stable during a medical extraction due to efficient WHO's protective measures applied

secondary_outcome.measure: Contamination under-control due to efficient decontamination measures applied during a medical extraction/evacuation
secondary_outcome.time_frame: At the patient's admission at the hospital emergency room (i.e.: end-point of the medical extraction/evacuation).
secondary_outcome.description: The percentage of patients whose health condition remained stable during a medical extraction due to efficient WHO's decontamination measures applied

secondary_outcome.measure: Deterioration of the patient's health condition due to compromised means of protection
secondary_outcome.time_frame: At the patient's admission at the hospital emergency room (i.e.: end-point of the medical extraction/evacuation).
secondary_outcome.description: The percentage of patients whose health condition deteriorate during a medical extraction due to the misuse of WHO's protective measures (e.g.: mask, suit, gloves, boots, etc).

secondary_outcome.measure: Deterioration of the patient's health condition due to compromised means of decontamination
secondary_outcome.time_frame: At the patient's admission at the hospital emergency room (i.e.: end-point of the medical extraction/evacuation).
secondary_outcome.description: The percentage of patients whose health condition deteriorated during a medical extraction due to the misuse of WHO's decontamination measures (e.g.: immediate (roughly) or/and thorough (specialized one)).
